name: Digby Dooright
text: I LOVE the pizza here.  It's one of my favorite places to get delivery from.  It is ALWAYS good regardless of what the reviewer below me said.  The lady who answered the phone was the best EVER!!  She was so friendly.  Love this place!

name: Linze Aya
text: Delicious pizza and the staff seemed really nice.

name: Loretta Shaw
text: The pizza was cold when we got it and the pizza had holes in the slices. If i worked there that would have never been sent out to my customers. Take pride in your work or dont work there. Very unsatisfied with the service and the food. If i could have given 0 stars i would have.

name: Brittany Hagens
text: The people are friendly when I call but the timing for delivery is awful! The past 3 times I have waited almost 2 hours to get my order. Today was an hour. The tracker sent out a text that it was out for delivery and it was 30 minutes after ‚Ä¶More

name: Chelsea Weber
text: I don't know why this Pizza Hut tastes better than all the other Pizza Huts, (since it's a chain) but it does. I always order online where you can really be picky with your order, hold this, extra that etc... Everything is always perfect and delicious everytime. It typically takes 10-15min longer than it says it will.

name: Jessi
text: I love Pizza Hut pizza and pastas. But their service has really slacked off on the last few months. I always frequent the same location. Every time pizzas are not ready when said time is promised. Always an extra 15-20 minutes waiting for carry out orders.

name: Kenny, Dawn Crutchley
text: Our last 4 orders have been wrong every time, our latest order was wrong and over a half hour late and the Custer service we received when we called to complain was absolutely horrible. Needless to say we will not order from this location ever again!

name: Ethan Taylor
text: Great place to eat as well as work. We may have had some issues in the past but we are working on getting those fixed! Expect a better and brighter future for alton pizza hut!!!!
